enter_device_info.title: Enter Device Information
enter_device_info.description: Please enter your Tuya device credentials

cop_method_description.direct_thermal: Direct thermal calculation using water flow and temperature difference (±5% accuracy)
cop_method_description.power_module: Power module estimation using internal sensors and external validation (±8% accuracy)
cop_method_description.power_estimation: Power consumption estimation using compressor and fan data (±10% accuracy)
cop_method_description.refrigerant_circuit: Refrigerant circuit analysis using pressure and temperature sensors (±12% accuracy)
cop_method_description.carnot_estimation: Carnot-based estimation using compressor frequency and ambient temperature (±15% accuracy)
cop_method_description.valve_correlation: Valve position correlation using expansion valve data (±20% accuracy)
cop_method_description.temperature_difference: Temperature difference estimation using empirical relationships (±30% accuracy)
cop_method_description.insufficient_data: Insufficient data available for any COP calculation method
